featuredArticle.title: Viral AI-Generated Movie Becomes First to Gross $100 Million at Box Office
featuredArticle.excerpt: An entirely AI-generated feature film has shattered box office records, sparking intense debate about the future of Hollywood. The film, created with minimal human intervention, has Hollywood unions calling for new regulations.
